sentences.en: All patients had similar degrees of frostbite.
sentences.cn: 所有的病人均有相似的冻伤程度.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The rewarming and therapeutic bag is a new methed to frostbite.
sentences.cn: 结论: 冻伤复温治疗袋开辟了冻伤复温治疗的新途径.

sentences.en: Four steps to take to avoid frostbite and hypothermia.
sentences.cn: 避免冻伤和低体温症要采取的四个步骤.

sentences.en: Frostbite is damage that happens when skin is exposed to extreme cold for too long.
sentences.cn: 冻伤是危险的,一般发生在皮肤长期暴露在极冷的环境.

sentences.en: If the frostbite is only superficial, new skin will form.
sentences.cn: 如果冻伤只是浅表的, 新的皮肤会长出来.

sentences.en: Lyons of liquid state fluorine , can send skin frostbite.
sentences.cn: 液态氟里昂, 可致皮肤冻伤.

sentences.en: Objective : To evaluate the effect of Marvelous Frostbite Curing Liquid on chilblain.
sentences.cn: 目的: 考察冻疮神水治疗冻疮的效果.

sentences.en: Ron Artest doesn't get frostbite. He bites frost.
sentences.cn: 阿泰不会被霜冻伤, 他只会把霜冻伤.

sentences.en: She is suffering from frostbite on her ears.
She was fighting off the numbness of frostbite.
sentences.cn: 她在竭力摆脱冻僵的感觉.

sentences.en: Sometimes, doctors have been ( to ) removed frostbite areas like fingers and toes.
sentences.cn: 有时, 医生不得不 切除 手指或脚趾的冻伤部位.

sentences.en: Then now my face would not frostbite scar.
sentences.cn: 那么今日我的脸上也不会留冻伤的疤痕.

sentences.en: Try not to get frostbite from the wind chill.
When everybody else wakes up, they see her dead of frostbite.
sentences.cn: 当大家醒来, 他们看见她已经冻死了.

words.tran_cn: 被霜覆盖的；冻伤的；冷淡的；无光泽的

trans.tran_en: a condition caused by extreme cold, that makes your fingers and toes swell, become darker, and sometimes fall off
